alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Marshall; East Otter Tail; East Polk; Grant; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 9:58PM CST until February 01 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A period of light snow...possibly mixed with freezing drizzle late evening into the overnight. Total accumulations up to 2 inches. After 3 am and continuing into the daytime Tuesday look for west to northwest winds gusting to 45 mph causing areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, East Marshall, North Beltrami, Pennington and Red Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
